sense.gloss: strong person, person putting on a brave front

joy, delight, rapture, pleasure, gratification, rejoicing, congratulations, felicitations
to be delighted, to be glad, to be pleased
lion at home but weakling elsewhere
agency for employing servants and arranging marriages (Edo period), mediator, go-between
someone haughty and boastful at home but meek and reserved outside, being a lion at home and a mouse abroad

sense.gloss: Achilles heel, one's weak point, shin
orpine (any plant of family Crassulaceae, esp. the garden stonecrop, Hylotelephium erythrostictum)
fortunate heredity, blessings, the rewards of virtue, something bequeathed to posterity

sdata.j: うちの↑前↑↓まえ↓のやせ↑犬↑↓いぬ↓・↑陰弁慶↑↓かげべんけい↓。
sdata.e: Every dog is a lion at home.

sdata.j: あなたは↑慶応↑↓けいおう↓の↑学生↑↓がくせい↓といつもデートしているのね。
sdata.e: You're dating a Keio university student, aren't you?

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓↑早稲田↑↓わせだ↓↑対↑↓たい↓↑慶応↑↓けいおう↓の↑試合↑↓しあい↓がある。
sdata.e: There is going to be a game between Waseda and Keio today.

sdata.j: ↑昨日↑↓きのう↓の↑試合↑↓しあい↓で↑早稲田↑↓わせだ↓は↑慶応↑↓けいおう↓と↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑分↑↓わ↓けた。

sdata.j: ↑内弁慶↑↓うちべんけい↓は↑誰↑↓だれ↓でもできる。
sdata.e: Every cock crows on his own dunghill.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑我々↑↓われわれ↓と↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑慶↑↓よろこ↓んでそれをした。

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑慶応大学↑↓けいおうだいがく↓を↑卒業↑↓そつぎょう↓するとすぐに↑家業↑↓かぎょう↓を↑継↑↓つ↓いだ。
sdata.e: As soon as he graduated from Keio University, he took over his family's business.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑内弁慶↑↓うちべんけい↓だ。
